author: Steve McCaskill
title: Mobile and broadband networks 'coping well' with home working traffic
description: Analysts believe resillient communications networks can restore telecoms industry reptuation
content:
Communications networks around the world are coping with the extra demands placed by the coronavirus crisis and could be an opportunity for the sector to restore its reputation, say analysts.
